General.Name: Thanh Thanh Cong Tay Ninh JSC
General.Description: Thanh Thanh Cong - Bien Hoa Joint Stock Company produces and trades in sugar and its by-products in Vietnam and internationally. The company is also involved in the production, transmission, and distribution of electricity; planting sugarcane and industrial crops; and producing and trading fertilizers and agricultural materials, alcohol and non-alcoholic beverages, mineral and bottled water, soft drinks, fruit juice, and soy milk. In addition, it engages in constructing civil engineering projects and industrial park infrastructure; hotels and restaurants businesses; trading of real estate properties, agricultural machines and tools, and petroleum and gas; the rental of houses, warehouses, offices, and apartments; investment activities; and the wholesale of consumer goods. Further, the company offers planting and technical advisory; packaging, warehousing, and storage; electricity system installation; and food industry machineries and equipment installation services, as well as technical and management consultancy services for the sugar industry. Additionally, it is involved in producing and developing mechanic machineries for sugar canes production; the provision of sugar cane cultivation services; cattle and livestock raising services; and trading of commodities and derivatives. The company was formerly known as Thanh Thanh Cong Tay Ninh Joint Stock Company and changed its name to Thanh Thanh Cong - Bien Hoa Joint Stock Company in November 2017. Thanh Thanh Cong - Bien Hoa Joint Stock Company was incorporated in 1995 and is headquartered in Tan Chau, Vietnam.
